channel.title: hangout on Haojin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in hangout on Haojin's Blog

item.title: My sophomore Fall
item.description: It has been a bittersweet semester with so many things happening out of control in an unexpected way.

item.title: Summertime 🏖️
item.description: It’s again been a long time since I wrote the last post.

item.title: Spring Unwrap
item.description: We just lost the most important home game today.

item.title: Washington DC - Day2
item.description: 今天混迹于各个博物馆之间，算是把美国的历史全方位各角度体验了一番，颇有收获。

item.title: New York City - Day4
item.description: 今天算是在纽约最后完整的一天了，明晚就要坐飞机离开了。今天也是感恩节假期的最后一天，这个我从两周前就开始期待的假期，无以言说的圆满。从序幕到进行时到临近尾声，我感恩遇到的一切新朋友，老朋友，遇见的新事物，旧事物。

item.title: New York City - Day3
item.description: 出人意料，这是我第一次觉得旅游的时光过的好慢，每天都游历了无数，结识了无数，感悟了无数。今天是第三天，也是想对来说较平淡的一天，却也是有额外的小确幸。

item.title: New York City - Day2
item.description: 真的太开心了，感觉不可能比今天更开心了。现在应该是喝醉了，想着喝醉了写一篇博客也很特别的，于是在凌晨两点决定也写博客。我也不知道自己会说什么胡话。

item.title: 随记
item.description: 哇，不知不觉就已经快到期末了。回顾这一学期，真的是经历了非常多的第一次。但或许还不是做总结的时候，就先从这周开始吧。

item.title: 天气转凉
item.description: 又一周过去了。怎么说，仔细想想这周好像并没有发生什么有趣的事情，或是极其枯燥无味的事情。真的像是从指尖流过的时间，无法察觉。

item.title: Halloween
item.description: 希望能坚持每周都记录下去吧。自从上次开始，重拾写博客之后，内心总是惦记着。写着看。

item.title: Last Spring Festival with Family
item.description: The year of OX, the last Spring Festival I could spend time with family members together.

item.title: Physical Exercises
item.description: On August 28th, I went to a military training base in rural area of my city with my fellow students.

item.title: Picking up exercise again
item.description: Glad to meet you again It’s been a long day without you, my friend And I’ll tell you all about it when I see you again We’ve come a long way from where we began Oh, I’ll tell you all about it when I see you again When I see you again

item.title: Summer vacation starts now
item.description: A colorful semester has gone A lot of words I want to say… This period of time I studied and lived in International Course Campus really impressed me.

item.title: A perfect event
item.description: A fantastic and amazing event that I will never forget I was in the front of the lobby hanging our robot with my teammate

item.title: The last day in Seattle
item.description: 西雅图夜未眠 “Country road, take me home, to the place, I belong……”, 完强老师的吉他演唱一直回荡在我耳边。从未想过，这里，如此让我留恋。
